NativeVocService.join: left join mislpu lpu on lpu.id=ce.lpu_id left join worker w on w.lpu_id=lpu.id

left join PriceMedService PMS ON PP.priceList_id = PMS.pricePosition_id left join MedContract MC ON MC.priceList_id = PP.priceList_id left join ServedPerson SP ON SP.contract_id=MC.id left join ContractAccount CA ON CA.servedPerson_id=sp.id left join MedService MS ON PMS.medService_id = MS.id
NativeVocService.queried: (upper(PP.code) like upper(:query) or upper(PP.name) like upper(:query))

NativeVocService.join: left join ContractAccount CA ON CAO.account_id = CA.id left join VocAccountOperation VAO ON CAO.type_id=VAO.id

left join worker w on w.lpu_id=wcp.lpu_id left join workfunction wf1 on wf1.lpu_id=wcp.lpu_id and wf1.DTYPE='GroupWorkFunction' left join workcalendar wc1 on wc1.workfunction_id=wf1.id left join workfunction wf on wf.worker_id=w.id and wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' left join workcalendar wc on wc.workfunction_id=wf.id
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wcp.id as varchar(5)) like :querId or wcp.name like :query)

NativeVocService.join: left join Patient p on p.id=mp.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: mp.id like :querId or (mp.series like $piece(:querId,' ',1)||'%' and (mp.polNumber like $piece(:querId,' ',2)||'%' or $piece(:querId,' ',2) is null)) or p.lastname like upper(:querId) or (p.lastname like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',1)||'%' and (p.firstname like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',2)||'%' or $piece(upper(:querId),' ',2) is null) and (p.middlename like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',3)||'%' or $piece(:querId,' ',3) is null))
cast(p.id as varchar(20)) like :querId or p.lastname like :querId or (p.lastname like :quer1 and (:quer2 is null or p.firstname like :quer2) and (:quer3 is null or p.middlename like :quer3))

NativeVocService.names: CASE WHEN cp.dtype='NaturalPerson' THEN 'Физ.лицо: '||p.lastname ||' '|| p.firstname|| ' '|| p.middlename||' г.р. '|| to_char(p.birthday,'DD.MM.YYYY') ELSE 'Юрид.лицо: '||cp.name END
NativeVocService.join: left join ContractPerson cp on cp.id=sp.person_id left join patient p on p.id=cp.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: sp.id like :querId or UPPER(cp.name) like :query or p.lastname like upper(:querId) or (p.lastname like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',1)||'%' and (p.firstname like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',2)||'%' or $piece(upper(:querId),' ',2) is null) and (p.middlename like $piece(upper(:querId),' ',3)||'%' or $piece(:querId,' ',3) is null))

NativeVocService.names: CASE WHEN cp.dtype='NaturalPerson' THEN 'Физ.лицо: '||p.lastname ||' '|| p.firstname|| ' '|| p.middlename||' г.р. '|| to_char(p.birthday,'DD.MM.YYYY') ELSE 'Юрид.лицо: '||cp.name END
NativeVocService.join: left join patient p on p.id=cp.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: cast(cp.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or UPPER(cp.name) like :query or p.lastname like upper(:querId) or (p.lastname like upper(:quer1) and (p.firstname like upper(:quer2) or :quer2='%') and (p.middlename like upper(:quer3) or :quer3='%'))

NativeVocService.parent: parent_id=:par1 and (startDate is null or to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy') >=startDate) and (finishDate is null or finishDate>=to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy'))
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(id as varchar(10)) like :query or name like UPPER(:query))

NativeVocService.parent: wf.id=:par1 and (ms.startDate is null or to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy') >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=to_date(:par2,'dd.mm.yyyy'))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: ms.vocMedService_id is not null and ms.isPoliclinic='1'
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id left join WorkFunction wf on wf.workFunction_id=wfs.vocWorkFunction_id

NativeVocService.parent: m.id=:parent and (wfs.lpu_id is null or wf.dtype='PersonalWorkFunction' and wfs.lpu_id=w.lpu_id or wf.dtype='GroupWorkFunction' and wfs.lpu_id=wf.lpu_id ) and (ms.startDate is null or wcd.calendardate >=ms.startDate) and (ms.finishDate is null or ms.finishDate>=wcd.calendardate)
NativeVocService.queryAppend: ms.vocMedService_id is not null and ms.isPoliclinic='1'
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunctionService wfs on wfs.medService_id=ms.id left join WorkFunction wf on wf.workFunction_id=wfs.vocWorkFunction_id left join medcase m on m.workFunctionPlan_id=wf.id left join WorkCalendarDay wcd on wcd.id=m.datePlan_id left join worker w on w.id=wf.worker_id
left join Patient pat on pat.id=preg.patient_id
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(preg.id as varchar(20)) like :querId or cast(preg.orderNumber as varchar(5)) like :querId)

NativeVocService.parent: k.person_id=(select m.person_id from medcard m where m.id=:parent)
NativeVocService.join: left join Patient as pk on pk.id=k.kinsman_id
left join Patient as pk on pk.id=k.kinsman_id

NativeVocService.queried: (omcCode like (:query) or name like UPPER(:query) or cast(id as varchar(20)) like (:querId))

EntityVocService.queryAppend: (deprecated is null or deprecated = false) and (isRegion=true)

NativeVocService.join: left join WorkCalendar as wc on wc.id=wcd.workCalendar_id

NativeVocService.queryAppend: wct.medCase_id is null and wct.prepatient_id is null and (wct.prepatientinfo is null or wct.prepatientinfo='')

EntityVocService.queryAppend: (archival is null or cast(archival as integer)=0)

NativeVocService.names: vwf.name||' '||case when w.person_id is null then wf.groupName else p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename end
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(20))= :querId or vwf.name like UPPER(:query) or p.lastname like UPPER(:query) or wf.groupName like UPPER(:query) )
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wc.id is not null and wf.group_id is null
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join WorkCalendar wc on wc.workFunction_id=wf.id

NativeVocService.parent: ( (select m.lpu_id from medcard as m where m.id=:parent) is null or w.lpu_id=(select m.lpu_id from medcard as m where m.id=:parent) )
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(6)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or cast(wf.archival as integer)=0)
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.code is null then '' else wf.code||' ' end || vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or cast(wf.archival as integer)=0)
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.code is null then '' else wf.code||' ' end || vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0') and (wf.isSurgical='1')
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id

NativeVocService.names: case when wf.code is null then '' else wf.code||' ' end || vwf.name||' '|| p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: (cast(wf.id as varchar(10)) like :querId or wf.code like :querId or p.lastname like UPPER(:query))
NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or wf.archival='0') and (wf.isInstrumentNurse='1')
NativeVocService.join: left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id
left join VocCardIndex vci on vci.id=m.cardIndex_id

NativeVocService.names: pcc.cardNumber ||' '|| coalesce((select vpac.code||' '||to_char(po.startDate,'dd.mm.yyyy') from PsychiaticObservation po left join VocPsychAmbulatoryCare vpac on vpac.id=po.ambulatoryCare_id where po.carecard_id=pcc.id having po.startDate=max(po.startDate)),'-')

NativeVocService.queryAppend: wf.DTYPE ='PersonalWorkFunction' and (wf.archival is null or cast(wf.archival as integer)=0)
NativeVocService.join: left join WorkFunction wf1 on wf1.worker_id=wf.worker_id left join SecUser su on su.id=wf1.secuser_id left join Worker as w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join Patient as p on p.id=w.person_id inner join VocWorkFunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id
left join Omc_KodTer as okt on okt.okato=oss.fondOkato

NativeVocService.names: case when smo.dtype='POLYCLINICMEDCASE' then 'СПО: '||smo.id when smo.dtype='HOSPITALMEDCASE' and smo.statisticstub_id is not null then 'СЛС: '||ss.code else 'СЛС: нет №стат.карты' end
NativeVocService.join: left join statisticstub ss on smo.statisticstub_id=ss.id

NativeVocService.names: case when smo.dtype='POLYCLINICMEDCASE' then 'СПО: '||smo.id when smo.dtype='HOSPITALMEDCASE' and smo.statisticstub_id is not null then 'СЛС: '||ss.code else 'СЛС: нет №стат.карты' end || ' ' || p.lastname||' '||p.firstname||' '||p.middlename
NativeVocService.queried: ss.code like :query or smo.id like :query or p.lastname like upper(:query) or (p.lastname like $piece(upper(:query),' ',1)||'%' and (p.firstname like $piece(upper(:query),' ',2)||'%' or $piece(upper(:query),' ',2) is null) and (p.middlename like $piece(upper(:query),' ',3)||'%' or $piece(:query,' ',3) is null))
NativeVocService.join: left join statisticstub ss on smo.statisticstub_id=ss.id left join patient p on p.id=smo.patient_id

left join MisLpu dep on smoD.department_id=dep.id left join workfunction wf on wf.id=smoD.ownerFunction_id left join VocWorkfunction vwf on vwf.id=wf.workFunction_id left join worker w on w.id=wf.worker_id left join patient wp on wp.id=w.person_id
left join medcase smoD on smoD.department_id =dep.id and smoD.DTYPE='DepartmentMedCase'

NativeVocService.queried: codeF like :querId or UPPER(name) like UPPER(:query)
NativeVocService.queryAppend: (disable is null or cast(disable as int)=0)
